questions.question: The research team managed to ____ a breakthrough in cancer treatment after years of dedicated experimentation.
questions.explanation: Achieve (başarmak, elde etmek) doğru cevaptır çünkü 'breakthrough' (çığır açan buluş) kelimesiyle en uyumlu eşleşmeyi yapar. Perform ve conduct daha çok deney veya araştırma yapmak için kullanılır. Execute genellikle plan veya görev için, operate ise makine veya sistem için kullanılır.

questions.question: Despite the ____ conditions in the laboratory, the scientists were able to obtain reliable results.
questions.explanation: Adverse (olumsuz, elverişsiz) doğru cevaptır. 'Despite' (rağmen) bağlacı bir zıtlık gösterdiği için, güvenilir sonuçlar elde etmenin zorlu koşullara rağmen gerçekleştiğini anlatır. Favorable, suitable, optimal ve ideal pozitif anlamlı kelimeler olup 'despite' ile mantıksal uyum sağlamaz.

questions.question: The economic policy implemented by the government has proven to be ____ in reducing inflation rates.
questions.explanation: Effective (etkili, başarılı) doğru cevaptır. 'Proven to be' ifadesi olumlu bir sonucu gösterir ve enflasyonu düşürmede başarılı olduğunu belirtir. Deficient, insufficient, inadequate ve limited olumsuz anlamlı kelimelerdir ve 'reducing inflation' başarısıyla uyuşmaz.

questions.question: The architect's ____ design for the new museum has attracted international attention.
questions.explanation: Innovative (yenilikçi, özgün) doğru cevaptır. Uluslararası dikkat çekmek için tasarımın sıra dışı olması gerekir. Conventional, ordinary, traditional ve standard sıradan ve alışılmış anlamına gelir, bu nedenle uluslararası ilgi çekmesi mantıken beklenmez.

questions.question: The professor's lecture was so ____ that many students struggled to understand the main concepts.
questions.explanation: Convoluted (karmaşık, dolambaçlı) doğru cevaptır. 'Struggled to understand' (anlamakta zorlandılar) ifadesi zorluk gösterdiği için, dersin karmaşık olduğunu belirtir. Clear, lucid, straightforward ve simple anlaşılır olduğunu gösterir ki bu öğrencilerin zorlanmasıyla çelişir.

questions.question: The company's decision to expand into Asian markets was based on ____ market research.
questions.explanation: Comprehensive (kapsamlı, eksiksiz) doğru cevaptır. Önemli bir iş kararı (Asya pazarına açılma) için kapsamlı araştırma yapılması beklenir. Superficial, cursory, shallow ve hasty yüzeysel ve aceleye gelmiş araştırmayı gösterir, bu da ciddi bir karar için uygun değildir.

questions.question: The environmental organization aims to ____ public awareness about climate change.
questions.explanation: Raise (artırmak, yükseltmek) doğru cevaptır. Bir çevre örgütünün amacı iklim değişikliği konusunda halkın farkındalığını artırmaktır. Diminish, reduce, lower ve decrease azaltmak anlamına gelir ki bu örgütün amacıyla ters düşer.

questions.question: The study reveals a strong ____ between regular exercise and improved mental health.
questions.explanation: Correlation (ilişki, korelasyon) doğru cevaptır. Bilimsel çalışmalarda iki değişken (egzersiz ve zihinsel sağlık) arasındaki ilişkiyi ifade etmek için 'correlation' kullanılır. Distinction, difference, separation ve division ayrılık veya farklılık gösterir, ilişki değil.

questions.question: The pharmaceutical company must ____ to strict safety regulations when testing new drugs.
questions.explanation: Adhere (uymak, bağlı kalmak) doğru cevaptır. 'Adhere to regulations' kurallara sıkı sıkıya uymak anlamında sabit bir kullanımdır. Adapt uyum sağlamak, adjust ayarlamak, apply başvurmak/uygulamak, attach eklemek anlamındadır ve 'to regulations' ile bu anlamda kullanılmaz.

questions.question: The historian's interpretation of the events has been ____ by recent archaeological discoveries.
questions.explanation: Confirmed (doğrulanmış, teyit edilmiş) doğru cevaptır. Arkeolojik bulgular genellikle tarihçilerin yorumlarını destekler veya doğrular. Denied, rejected, opposed ve contradicted olumsuz anlamlıdır ve bulgularla yorum arasında çelişki olduğunu gösterir ki bu daha az olası bir durumdur.

questions.question: The new renewable energy project was approved by the committee, ____ it still requires additional funding to begin operations.
questions.explanation: However (ancak, fakat) doğru cevaptır. İlk cümlede proje onaylanmış, ikinci cümlede ek fon gerekliliği belirtiliyor. Bu bir karşıtlık durumudur. Therefore, consequently ve thus sonuç bildirirken, furthermore ek bilgi ekler, ikisi de buradaki zıtlığı gösteremez.

questions.question: Many scientists believe that artificial intelligence will transform society; ____, they warn about potential ethical concerns.
questions.explanation: Nevertheless (bununla birlikte, yine de) doğru cevaptır. Bilim insanları yapay zekanın toplumu dönüştüreceğine inanıyor ancak etik kaygılardan da bahsediyorlar. Bu bir zıtlık gösterir. Similarly ve likewise benzerlik, therefore ve hence sonuç bildirir.

questions.question: ____ the heavy rainfall, the outdoor concert was not cancelled and proceeded as planned.
questions.explanation: Despite (rağmen) doğru cevaptır. Yoğun yağmura rağmen konser iptal edilmemiş, bu bir karşıtlık durumudur. Due to, because of, owing to ve as a result of sebep-sonuç ilişkisi gösterir ve mantıken yağmur konseri iptal ettirmeliydi, ama burada tersi olmuş.

questions.question: The research findings were published in a prestigious journal, ____ significantly enhancing the university's academic reputation.
questions.explanation: Thereby (böylece, bu sayede) doğru cevaptır. Araştırma bulgularının prestijli bir dergide yayınlanması sonucunda üniversitenin itibarı artmış. Yet, however ve nevertheless zıtlık bildirir. Although 'enhancing' ile yapı olarak uyumsuz.

questions.question: ____ advances in medical technology, many diseases remain incurable at present.
questions.explanation: Despite (rağmen) doğru cevaptır. Tıbbi teknolojideki ilerlemelere rağmen bazı hastalıklar hala tedavi edilemiyor, bu bir karşıtlık. Because of, due to, thanks to ve as a result of sebep-sonuç gösterir, ama burada ilerlemeye rağmen tedavi edilememe durumu var.

questions.question: The government has introduced stricter environmental regulations; ____, industries must now reduce their carbon emissions substantially.
questions.explanation: Consequently (sonuç olarak, bu nedenle) doğru cevaptır. Hükümet çevre düzenlemeleri getirmiş, bunun sonucu olarak endüstriler emisyonları azaltmak zorunda. Nevertheless, however ve yet zıtlık belirtir. Whereas karşılaştırma yapar.

questions.question: The patient showed improvement after surgery, ____ complete recovery will take several months.
questions.explanation: But (ama, fakat) doğru cevaptır. Hasta ameliyattan sonra iyileşme göstermiş ancak tam iyileşme aylar alacak. Bu bir kısmi zıtlık. And sadece bağlar, so, thus ve therefore sonuç bildirir ki burada sonuç değil karşıtlık var.

questions.question: Online education offers flexibility and accessibility; ____, it lacks the face-to-face interaction of traditional classrooms.
questions.explanation: On the other hand (öte yandan, diğer taraftan) doğru cevaptır. Çevrimiçi eğitimin avantajları sayılmış, ardından dezavantajı belirtiliyor. Bu bir karşılaştırma/zıtlık. Moreover, furthermore ve in addition ek bilgi ekler. Similarly benzerlik gösterir.

questions.question: ____ the experiment was conducted under controlled conditions, the results showed unexpected variations.
questions.explanation: Although (her ne kadar, rağmen) doğru cevaptır. Deney kontrollü koşullarda yapıldı ama yine de beklenmeyen sonuçlar çıktı, bu bir zıtlık. Because, since ve as sebep gösterir. Due to'dan sonra isim gelir, cümle gelmez.

questions.question: The author's first novel received critical acclaim, ____ establishing her as a prominent voice in contemporary literature.
questions.explanation: Thus (böylece, bu şekilde) doğru cevaptır. İlk roman eleştirmenlerden övgü aldı, bu sayede yazar önemli bir ses haline geldi. Sonuç ilişkisi var. Yet, however ve nevertheless zıtlık bildirir. Although cümle yapısıyla uyumsuz.

questions.question: The implementation of sustainable farming practices has become increasingly critical for ensuring long-term food security.
options: Adopting environmentally-friendly agricultural methods is growing more important for guaranteeing future food availability.
Traditional farming techniques are necessary to maintain food production in the coming years.
The development of new crops has proven essential for meeting global nutritional needs.
Industrial agriculture must be replaced immediately to prevent environmental damage.
Food security can only be achieved through technological innovations in farming.
questions.explanation: A şıkkı doğru cevaptır. 'Sustainable farming practices' (sürdürülebilir tarım uygulamaları) = 'environmentally-friendly agricultural methods', 'increasingly critical' (giderek daha kritik) = 'growing more important', 'ensuring' (güvence altına alma) = 'guaranteeing', 'long-term food security' (uzun vadeli gıda güvenliği) = 'future food availability'. Diğer şıklar özgün cümlenin anlamını tam olarak yansıtmıyor.

questions.question: Despite numerous technological advances, human creativity remains irreplaceable in artistic endeavors.
options: Technological progress has eliminated the need for human involvement in art.
Artistic activities still depend on modern technology rather than human imagination.
Even with many technological developments, human originality cannot be substituted in creative work.
Human creativity has been enhanced by technological tools in all artistic fields.
Modern technology has proven superior to human creativity in producing art.
questions.explanation: C şıkkı doğru cevaptır. 'Despite numerous technological advances' (sayısız teknolojik gelişmeye rağmen) = 'even with many technological developments', 'human creativity' (insan yaratıcılığı) = 'human originality', 'remains irreplaceable' (yeri doldurulamaz olmaya devam ediyor) = 'cannot be substituted', 'artistic endeavors' (sanatsal çabalar) = 'creative work'. Diğer şıklar özgün cümleyle çelişiyor veya farklı anlam taşıyor.

questions.question: The researcher's findings challenged conventional theories and opened new avenues for scientific investigation.
options: The scientist confirmed traditional beliefs and continued existing research methods.
The study supported established theories while suggesting minor modifications.
The investigator's results contradicted accepted ideas and created fresh possibilities for research.
Conventional scientific approaches were strengthened by the researcher's discoveries.
The findings proved that traditional theories were completely accurate.
questions.explanation: C şıkkı doğru cevaptır. 'Findings challenged' (bulgular meydan okudu) = 'results contradicted', 'conventional theories' (geleneksel teoriler) = 'accepted ideas', 'opened new avenues' (yeni yollar açtı) = 'created fresh possibilities', 'scientific investigation' (bilimsel araştırma) = 'research'. Diğer şıklar özgün cümlenin zıttı veya farklı anlamlar içeriyor.

questions.question: Rapid urbanization has led to significant environmental degradation in many developing countries.
options: Quick city growth has caused serious environmental damage in numerous emerging nations.
Slow urban development has improved environmental conditions in poor countries.
Environmental protection has accelerated urban expansion in developing regions.
Urbanization has had no impact on the environment in emerging economies.
Developing countries have successfully prevented environmental harm during city growth.
questions.explanation: A şıkkı doğru cevaptır. 'Rapid urbanization' (hızlı kentleşme) = 'quick city growth', 'has led to' (yol açmıştır) = 'has caused', 'significant environmental degradation' (önemli çevresel bozulma) = 'serious environmental damage', 'many developing countries' (birçok gelişmekte olan ülke) = 'numerous emerging nations'. Diğer şıklar özgün anlamı doğru yansıtmıyor.

questions.question: The author's nuanced perspective on social inequality provides valuable insights into contemporary societal challenges.
options: The writer's simple view of social differences offers basic information about modern problems.
The author's detailed understanding of social disparity gives important understanding of current social issues.
Social inequality has been ignored by the author in discussing modern challenges.
The writer focuses only on economic factors when examining societal problems.
Contemporary challenges are unrelated to the author's analysis of social issues.
questions.explanation: B şıkkı doğru cevaptır. 'Nuanced perspective' (nüanslı bakış açısı) = 'detailed understanding', 'social inequality' (sosyal eşitsizlik) = 'social disparity', 'provides valuable insights' (değerli görüşler sunuyor) = 'gives important understanding', 'contemporary societal challenges' (çağdaş toplumsal zorluklar) = 'current social issues'. Diğer şıklar özgün cümlenin anlamını yanlış yansıtıyor.

questions.question: The medical breakthrough has the potential to revolutionize treatment approaches for chronic diseases.
options: The medical discovery might completely transform how chronic illnesses are treated.
Chronic diseases will remain untreatable despite medical advances.
Traditional treatment methods are superior to new medical discoveries.
The medical breakthrough has no relevance to treating long-term illnesses.
Chronic disease treatment has already been perfected through past research.
questions.explanation: A şıkkı doğru cevaptır. 'Medical breakthrough' (tıbbi çığır açan buluş) = 'medical discovery', 'has the potential to' (potansiyeline sahip) = 'might', 'revolutionize' (devrim yaratmak) = 'completely transform', 'treatment approaches' (tedavi yaklaşımları) = 'how...are treated', 'chronic diseases' (kronik hastalıklar) = 'chronic illnesses'. Diğer şıklar özgün anlama ters düşüyor.

questions.question: Economic globalization has intensified competition among businesses while creating new market opportunities.
options: Global economic integration has reduced business competition and limited market possibilities.
Worldwide economic connections have increased rivalry between companies and generated fresh commercial prospects.
Economic isolation has proven more beneficial than globalization for businesses.
Market opportunities have decreased as a result of global economic trends.
Competition among businesses has disappeared due to economic globalization.
questions.explanation: B şıkkı doğru cevaptır. 'Economic globalization' (ekonomik küreselleşme) = 'worldwide economic connections', 'has intensified competition' (rekabeti yoğunlaştırdı) = 'increased rivalry', 'among businesses' (işletmeler arasında) = 'between companies', 'while creating' (oluştururken) = 'and generated', 'new market opportunities' (yeni pazar fırsatları) = 'fresh commercial prospects'. Diğer şıklar özgün cümleye aykırı.

questions.question: The decline in biodiversity poses a serious threat to ecosystem stability and human well-being.
options: Increasing biodiversity has improved ecosystem health and human welfare.
The reduction in species variety presents a grave danger to environmental balance and human welfare.
Ecosystem stability is unaffected by changes in biodiversity levels.
Human well-being has improved despite declining biodiversity.
Biodiversity loss has only minor consequences for natural systems.
questions.explanation: B şıkkı doğru cevaptır. 'Decline in biodiversity' (biyoçeşitlilikte azalma) = 'reduction in species variety', 'poses a serious threat' (ciddi bir tehdit oluşturuyor) = 'presents a grave danger', 'ecosystem stability' (ekosistem istikrarı) = 'environmental balance', 'human well-being' (insan refahı) = 'human welfare'. Diğer şıklar özgün anlamı doğru yansıtmıyor.

questions.question: Digital literacy has become as fundamental as traditional reading and writing skills in modern education.
options: Computer skills are less important than conventional literacy in contemporary schooling.
Traditional education methods are superior to digital learning approaches.
The ability to use technology is now as essential as basic literacy skills in today's educational system.
Reading and writing have been completely replaced by digital technologies in schools.
Modern education no longer requires traditional literacy skills.
questions.explanation: C şıkkı doğru cevaptır. 'Digital literacy' (dijital okuryazarlık) = 'ability to use technology', 'has become as fundamental as' (kadar temel hale geldi) = 'is now as essential as', 'traditional reading and writing skills' (geleneksel okuma yazma becerileri) = 'basic literacy skills', 'modern education' (modern eğitim) = 'today's educational system'. Diğer şıklar özgün anlamdan sapıyor.

questions.question: The architect's innovative design seamlessly integrates modern aesthetics with environmental sustainability.
options: The designer's traditional approach separates beauty from environmental concerns.
The architect's creative plan smoothly combines contemporary visual appeal with ecological responsibility.
Modern architecture must sacrifice aesthetics to achieve environmental goals.
Environmental sustainability is incompatible with innovative architectural design.
The building design prioritizes appearance over environmental considerations.
questions.explanation: B şıkkı doğru cevaptır. 'Architect's innovative design' (mimarın yenilikçi tasarımı) = 'designer's creative plan', 'seamlessly integrates' (kusursuzca bütünleştirir) = 'smoothly combines', 'modern aesthetics' (modern estetik) = 'contemporary visual appeal', 'environmental sustainability' (çevresel sürdürülebilirlik) = 'ecological responsibility'. Diğer şıklar özgün cümlenin anlamına ters düşüyor.

questions.passage: The field of artificial intelligence has evolved dramatically over the past decade. questions.passage: Neuroplasticity, the brain's remarkable ability to reorganize itself by forming new neural connections throughout life, has revolutionized our understanding of cognitive development and recovery from brain injuries. For decades, scientists believed that the adult brain was relatively fixed and incapable of significant change. This dogma has been thoroughly dismantled by mounting evidence demonstrating that the brain remains malleable well into old age. Environmental enrichment, learning new skills, and even meditation have been shown to induce structural changes in the brain. For instance, London taxi drivers, who must memorize complex city layouts, exhibit enlarged hippocampi compared to the general population. Similarly, musicians show enhanced development in areas responsible for auditory processing and fine motor control. The therapeutic implications are profound. Stroke patients can recover lost functions through intensive rehabilitation that leverages neuroplasticity. Moreover, understanding neuroplasticity has led to novel interventions for conditions ranging from depression to learning disabilities. However, neuroplasticity is a double-edged sword; maladaptive plasticity can reinforce harmful patterns, such as chronic pain or addiction. The challenge for modern neuroscience is to harness beneficial plasticity while preventing detrimental changes.

questions.passage: Antibiotic resistance has emerged as one of the most pressing public health challenges of the 21st century. The overuse and misuse of antibiotics in both human medicine and agriculture have accelerated the evolution of resistant bacterial strains, rendering previously effective treatments obsolete. When antibiotics are prescribed unnecessarily—such as for viral infections against which they are ineffective—or when patients fail to complete prescribed courses, bacteria are exposed to sublethal doses that promote the selection of resistant variants. Agricultural practices compound the problem; livestock are routinely given antibiotics not only to treat infections but also to promote growth, creating vast reservoirs of resistant bacteria that can transfer to humans through the food chain or environmental contamination. Addressing this crisis requires a multifaceted approach: developing new antibiotics, implementing stricter regulations on antibiotic use in agriculture, improving infection prevention measures, and educating both healthcare providers and the public about appropriate antibiotic stewardship. However, pharmaceutical companies have limited financial incentives to invest in new antibiotic development, as these drugs are typically used sparingly and for short durations, making them less profitable than medications for chronic conditions.
